Package com.fluidops.fedx

Class Summary
CLI The command line interface for federated query processing with FedX.
Config Configuration properties for FedX based on a properties file.
EndpointManager EndpointManager is the singleton instance that manages available Endpoints.
FederationManager The FederationManager manages all modules necessary for the runtime behavior.
FedX FedX serves as implementation of the federation layer.
FedXConnection An implementation of RepositoryConnection that uses FederationEvalStrategy to evaluate provided queries.
FedXFactory FedX initialization factory methods for convenience: methods initialize the FederationManager and all required FedX structures.
QueryManager QueryManager to manage queries.
 

Enum Summary
FederationManager.FederationType The Federation type definition: Local, Remote, Hybrid
